mapper.select: select cs.id, cs.name, cs.city_id, cs.x_position, cs.y_position, cs2.sameNum from tb_city_site cs, tb_areas a, (select count(id) sameNum, id, city_id from tb_city_site group by name) cs2 where a.name = #{cityName} and a.id = cs.city_id and a.id = cs2.city_id and cs.id = cs2.id
select id,name,city_id,x_position,y_position from tb_city_site where name = #{siteName}
